titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the Ecclesiastical Commission, open'd in the Jerusalem-Chamber, October the 10th, 1689
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
England and Wales. Act concerning the submission of the clergy to the King's Majesty.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Tenison. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
An act concerning the submission of the clergy to the Kings Majesty, Anno 25 Henrici Octavi cap. 19 : p. 21-28.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
